mapper.select: SELECT a.id one_id, a.t_knowledge_name one_name, b.id two_id, b.t_knowledge_name two_name, c.id three_id, c.t_knowledge_name three_name, e.t_username FROM tb_knowledge a LEFT JOIN tb_knowledge b ON a.id = b.t_parent_id LEFT JOIN tb_knowledge c ON b.id = c.t_parent_id, tb_employee e WHERE a.t_parent_id = 0 and e.id=a.t_knowledge_man order by a.t_update_date

SELECT a.id one_id, a.t_knowledge_name one_name, b.id two_id, b.t_knowledge_name two_name, c.id three_id, c.t_knowledge_name three_name FROM tb_knowledge a LEFT JOIN tb_knowledge b ON a.id=b.t_parent_id LEFT JOIN tb_knowledge c ON b.id=c.t_parent_id WHERE a.t_parent_id=0 AND a.id=#{id}
